void MoveObject ( Vec2 *  Pos,
enum Direction  dirMove,
float  move_dist

Moves an object a specific direction and distance.

Parameters:
PosThe position to be moved
dirMoveAn enum of the direction to move
move_distThe distance to move the object

Definition at line 40 of file Movement.c.

{
        switch (dirMove)
        {
                case LEFT:
                        Pos->x -= move_dist;
                        break;
                case RIGHT:
                        Pos->x += move_dist;
                        break;
                case UP:
                        Pos->y += move_dist;                            
                        break;
                case DOWN:
                        Pos->y -= move_dist;
                        break;
        }
}
